title: (x) "Capri" stone carved sign - ITC Tiffany {Henning}
content:
Can anyone ID the font used on this sign. It reminds me of some form of Garamond, but I am coming up empty.

Hmm, insert image and the attachment function is not working for me. rgb jpeg file, 500pixels wide

 [‹ Nintendo Wii](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808060107/http:/typophile.com/node/19584 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for Biganne (hand printed script) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808060107/http:/typophile.com/node/19498 "Go to next forum topic")
author: vector

comments.content: The best way to get IDs at the moment is to give us a link from an external site (flickr).

I think it’s a Caslon.

- Lex
